Text.Value: So, a vampire walks among us? Of course, I had my suspicions...
A vamp, huh? Not got designs on my neck, I hope.
A vampire. Chk - I should have seen the signs.
We've been travelling with a vampire all this time?
Seems we've got a vampire among us.

Text.Value: We've been travelling with a godsdamned vampire?

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Character saw Astarion use his 'bite' ability on someone else and we can't play the InParty

Text.Value: Good, because even my open mind has limits. You won't like what happens if you cross them.
For your sake, I hope you're right - or I will slice you into bloody bits.
Better not. That's all I'll say.

Let's hope not. Because you won't like the consequences if you do.

Synopsis:
Characters reflect on learning that Astarion is really a vampire.
1. Can happen after a camp night with the victim being an Avatar. Victim may or may not participate in the dicussion.
2. Can happen upon moving to CRE or SCL. First speaker - random avatar.
3. Can happen after seeing Astarion-Avatar biring someone in gameplay. Victim may or may not participate in the dicussion.

3rd and 4th speakers - optional avatars. 1st and 2nd speaker (astarion) are always present.
